summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of alley, Block 4, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the alley between 30th Avenue South and 31st Avenue South, from McClellan Street to Mt. Baker Park Boulevard; by grading and paving, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 95343 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
